display_long_description:
Time will melt away as you move your body and explore the globe. Cycle through real world locations, work out with a trainer, surf through city streets, or even test your geography knowledge all while working towards a healthier you. 

We believe that fitness should be fun. So we have designed VZfit to keep you excited and coming back for more.

CHOOSE HOW YOU PLAY

Choose to work out with one of our trainers or turn on some of the great streaming music we offer and get your dance on. Either way, your motion in the real world keeps you moving.

Connect a bike to really kick up your experience. Attach the sensor to the pedal of a stationary bike and off you go! Every ride is now a tour of your favorite destinations, as you visit the snow capped Italian alps or pedal along the sun kissed coast of Oahu.

Looking for something more fast paced? Ring Racer uses our active motion controls to let you race hoverboards through the city streets of the world. Work your way up the leaderboards and unlock banners for your home space.

SO MUCH TO TRY

VZfit is sure to keep you busy with: Challenges- timed events with fun themed character outfits, location guessing game, Pinpoint!, multiplayer, virtual rides, mixed reality, and more. With 10 million miles of road out there, there is something new waiting around every corner.

Ready to ride?

Start your free trial today, or take advantage of our seasonal introductory offer.
